issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: We are working on adding a windows 10 version of our app to add to our ios and android versions. One of the issues we are having with that is that Modules.EncryptedDatabase is not available on Windows, we need this module in order to have the same features between our versions for security standards we have to meet.

comments.body: Hello, Thanks for the request. Our module team will look into it. Please understand there is no timeline for this. We will keep this ticket open for now. Thanks.
